rules.ruleString: (Incompatible with (I/W) {MED4111, MED4112} and  Incompatible with enrolment in a (I/W) Unit Set from {NON-MBBS})
Must be enrolled in course version {0041, 4535, M3701}

time: Summer semester A (starts November) 2017 to First semester 2018 (Day)

description: This unit allows students to undertake a supervised research project aimed at identifying and addressing a gap in medical research knowledge. It is designed to give students a strong foundation in the principles and practice of research. It will also enable students to develop a wide variety of skills including data analysis and communication of medical and scientific ideas in oral presentations and a written thesis. Students will be able to select from a wide range of project proposals that will enable them to pursue a specific area of interest working with their chosen supervisor.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
